name: @windingtree/org.id-subgraph
description: The ORGiD subgraph maps the ORGiD Contract with events in GraphQL

scripts.test: echo "âœ” Tests are skipped for the subgraph package"
scripts.prepare:ropsten: mustache config/ropsten.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/ropsten.json src/constants.template.ts > src/constants.ts
scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.json src/constants.template.ts > src/constants.ts
scripts.codegen:ropsten: npm run prepare:ropsten && npm run import:abi && npm run codegen:graph
scripts.codegen:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && npm run import:abi && npm run codegen:graph
scripts.deploy:ropsten: npm run codegen:ropsten && graph deploy --node <THEGRAPH_DEPLOYMENT_URI> --ipfs <IPFS_SERVER_URI>/ipfs/ windingtree/orgid-subgraph-ropsten
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run codegen:mainnet && graph deploy --node <THEGRAPH_DEPLOYMENT_URI> --ipfs <IPFS_SERVER_URI>/ipfs/ windingtree/orgid-subgraph
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:ropsten && npm run deploy:mainnet
